channel.description: Week 1 Announcements Russell Feldhausen Pronouns: he/him (785) 292-3121 (Call/Text) 2184 Engineering Hall (working remotely) russfeld AT ksu DOT edu https://russfeld.me - @russfeld Piazza Preferred Graduate Teaching Assistant BreAnn Anshutz banshutz AT ksu DOT edu Piazza Preferred What's New? 1 Module Due Each Week Late Work Penalty - 10% / Day Prototype Portion in Final Project Minor Changes in Each Lab 5 Interactive Discussions Discussions Will Schedule During First Week 1 Discussion Per Weeks 2 - 6 Live Portion Via Zoom Attendance Recommended!
